info.description: Customer API for FTM and CIMS
info.title: customer-accessible-api

get.description: Fetches information about a customer the user has access too

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The id of the customer to retrieve

href.description: A Link to the CURIE reference

templated.description: Describes the link as being a template

type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML).

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description:
A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the
problem.

get.description: Fetches all the user has access too

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)

type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML).

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description:
A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the
problem.

parameters.description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)

signedToken.description:
To Generate an API Follow these steps:
 1. concatenate KEY + URL + REQUEST BODY
 1. create SHA512 hash of step 1 string
 1. concatenate USER + ":" + SHA512 hash
 1. base64 encode string from step 3
 1. Pass in as a Bearer token
signedToken.name: Authorization
